subject: blueberry muffins
body:
i'm thankful that k texted me to tell me that two of the three books on her library hold list were ones i suggested (and i'm thankful that the third was one i had read and loved).

i'm thankful that d found us a new source of bootleg _love island uk_ episodes after the previous source got shut down.

i'm thankful for the blueberry muffins that she made and for the way on the second day they had soaked up some of the lemon sugar coating them and softened.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that k texted me to tell me that two of the three books on her library hold list were ones i suggested (and i'm thankful that the third was one i had read and loved).

i'm thankful that d found us a new source of bootleg _love island uk_ episodes after the previous source got shut down.

i'm thankful for the blueberry muffins that she made and for the way on the second day they had soaked up some of the lemon sugar coating them and softened.
